name: INV_EOB_CAS_CLM
description: This table holds the edited explanation of benefits (EOB) information for a claim to be used by claim processing for any claim associated with this invoice (INV).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EDIT_EOB_CLM_CVG_ID
columns.description: The edited explanation of benefits coverage at the claim level.

columns.name: EDIT_EOB_GRP_CLM_C_NAME
columns.description: The edited explanation of benefits group code at the claim level.

columns.name: EDIT_EOB_RMT_CD_CLM
columns.description: The edited explanation of benefits remit code at the claim level.

columns.name: EDIT_EOB_AMT_CLM
columns.description: The edited explanation of benefits amount at the claim level.

columns.name: EDIT_EOB_QTY_CLM
columns.description: The edited explanation of benefits quantity at the claim level.
